name: POINT-DATA - displays a dot at each location mentioned in proximity to your search term. Image functionality is disabled
IMAGE POINT-DATA - as above, but for image searches. Search terms are disabled
POINT HEATMAP - heatmap of the locations most closely associated with your search term (GeoJSON only)
IMAGE POINT HEATMAP - as above, but for image searches
POINT ANIMATION - a series of heatmaps in 15 minute increments over the past 24 hours (GeoJSON only)
IMAGE POINT-ANIMATION - as above, but for image searches
COUNTRY - aggregates all locations to country level. Also performs normalization, dividing number of mentions in context of your search by total mentions
IMAGE COUNTRY - as above, but for image searches
SOURCE COUNTRY - reflects the country or origin of your search results
IMAGE SOURCE COUNTRY - as above, but for image searches
ADM1 - as COUNTRY but higher administrative granularity
IMAGE ADM1 - as above, but for image searches
